tool_description: An API to access all the programs of most universities in the world.
name: Undergraduate and graduate programs
title: Undergraduate and graduate programs

api_list.name: Get all the education programs you need
api_list.description: Access to information on graduate and undergraduate academic programs

required_parameters.name: degree
required_parameters.description: bachelor, master, phd, law, mba, healthcare, online.

required_parameters.name: limit
required_parameters.description: Limit of programs you want to get

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://undergraduate-and-graduate-programs.p.rapidapi.com/all-degree/10/Programs/bachelor"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "undergraduate-and-graduate-programs.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://undergraduate-and-graduate-programs.p.rapidapi.com/all-degree/{limit}/{category}/{degree}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "undergraduate-and-graduate-programs.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
